actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Environment and Public Works with amendment, S. Rept. 95-196.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure passed House, amended, in lieu of H.R. 3455.
Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 95-788.

official_title: An Act to authorize appropriations for Nuclear Regulatory Commission for the fiscal years 1978, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 95-788) Authorizes appropriations for the Nuclear Regulatory Commission for fiscal year 1978 in the amount of $297,740,000 to carry out research and regulatory programs. Directs the Commission to consider the recommendation of the Advisory committee on Reactor Safeguards before authorizing any regulatory research on reactor safety. Provides for a reduction in the authorization by $2,700,000, if the license application is withdrawn or the construction of the Clinch River Breeder Reactor is not authorized. Provides for a reduction in the authorization by $2,100,000, if the license application is withdrawn or further construction is cancelled for the fuel reprocessing plant at Barnwell, South Carolina. Directs the Commission to report to Congress on a quarterly basis concerning the hiring and promotion procedures for employees at or above the level of GS-11. Amends the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 to direct the Commission to develop and implement a plan for the correction of unresolved safety issues relating to nuclear reactors. Amends the Atomic Energy Act to establish a fellowship program to study reactor safety research. Directs the Commission to promulgate standards on conflicts of interest in dealing with contractors. Authorizes the transfer of sums from salaries and expenses to other agencies of the Government for the performance of the work for which the appropriation is made.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission in accordance with section 261 of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, as amended, and section 305 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974, as amended.
An Act to authorize appropriations for Nuclear Regulatory Commission for the fiscal years 1978, and for other purposes.
